  • Method Details

    • upload

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode upload(List<String> filePaths, String txnId, String action, Map<String,Object> extraData, Map<String,Object> outputFormat) throws IOException, care.eka.v2rx.EkaScribeError
      Upload files for V2RX processing
      Parameters:
      filePaths - List of file paths to upload
      txnId - Transaction ID (optional)
      action - Action type (default: "default")
      extraData - Additional data map
      outputFormat - Output format configuration map
      Returns:
      JsonNode containing upload result
      Throws:
      IOException - If upload fails
      care.eka.v2rx.EkaScribeError - If EkaScribe specific processing fails

    • getSessionStatus

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getSessionStatus(String sessionId, String action) throws IOException
      Fetch the status of a voice recording session.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The ID of the voice recording session
      Returns:
      JsonNode containing the session status information
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the request Example: 
       EkaCareClient client = new EkaCareClient("your_id", "your_secret");
 JsonNode sessionStatus = client.getV2RX().fetchSessionStatus("session123");
 System.out.println(sessionStatus.get("status").asText());
